programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1977
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep371
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: During the 16th century, pirates rule the Chinese coastline, pillaging the small villages and terrorizing the citizens. When maverick leader Commander Yu (martial arts legend Sammo Hung) enlists the help of a sharp young general (Vincent Zhao), they devise a plan to defeat the pirates.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, catch this exciting crime-action about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organizations who killed his father in Thailand.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Triad
programme.desc: This is a story about the Hong Kong Triads. Ting (William Chan). Cheung (Derek Tsang) and Dong (Edward Chui) are childhood friends who join a Triad together. After joining however, they discover that fame and fortune will ultimately break them apart as only one of them can become the leader of the gang.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages and calls and app notifications on each other’s cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three men who are close as brothers is put through the ultimate test when one of them gives in to corruption and pursues his love for his friend's wife.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Angel With The Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan’s first major movies) for an evocative and terrific “Martial arts world” adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: This little-seen sixties espionage thriller from Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu boasts a star-studded cast including legendary martial artist Cheng Pei Pei and Paul Chang.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in the northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Because of his ignorance and silly behaviour, he was seen as a joke to the people. The warlord was finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason.

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: An actress has information on a crime syndicate and assassins are sent after her. Ricky and Swordflower are to stay undercover at the actress’ house to capture the assassins. When three assassins eventually turn up at a recreation building, Muscle and Ricky arrive in the nick of time for the showdown.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son’s arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Patricia Ha stars with Deanie Ip in her most famous and audacious role as a young woman rising to fame as a popular bargirl in this local answer to Hollywood's The World of Suzie Wong.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general’s escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper’s daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Kadugu
programme.desc: A man goes up against corrupt and powerful people to avenge the crime committed against a child.

programme.title: Vyjayanthi Ips
programme.desc: Vyjayanthi is a police officer who is dedicated to her work. When she arrests a young man who was involved in a sexual assault case, his father vows to kill her.

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: Kavya, a rich girl, goes to a restricted area in Andaman to celebrate the New Year with her friends. While evading the forest officers in the jungle, she knocks Jara, a tribal man, with her car.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Diya (Karu)
programme.desc: When Thulasi gets pregnant before marriage, she is forced to abort the baby. Years later, her unborn baby's spirit kills all those who forced her mother to undergo an abortion.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Tanaa
programme.desc: This is about a life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Jadaa
programme.desc: Jada, a rising football star, sets aside his ambitions to participate in a violent local tournament to avenge the death of his hero, Sethu.

programme.title: The Greatfather
programme.desc: The rape of his beloved 10-year-old daughter Sarah enrages David Nainan, a famed builder. As he and his devastated wife Michelle try to locate the rapist, they discover his serial crimes.

programme.title: Thangaraja
programme.desc: Manjula falls in love with Raja but he is scared to reciprocate his feelings. Later, he discovers that Manjula's father is the same man who destroyed his sister's life.

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Podhuvaaga Emmanasu Thangam
programme.desc: A young man's dream to do good deeds for the upliftment of his village is interrupted by an influential man, who does not want anyone to grow above him.

programme.title: Idhu Kadhirvelan Kaadhal
programme.desc: Kathir, who hates marriage, is in Coimbatore to resolve a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra but his heart is broken when he discovers that she is in love with someone else.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Kallan
programme.desc: Velu, a man who belongs to a family of hunters, comes up with an illegal way to make good money when the government puts a ban on hunting as a profession.

programme.title: Salim
programme.desc: Salim, a doctor, runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon, his patience with the justice system snaps and he takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Varappogum 24 Manikkul
programme.desc: Three fugitives barge into a couple's house while escaping the authorities. However, they are flummoxed after finding the wife concealing a murder that has transpired in her home.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep07
programme.desc: Communication Breakdown - Everyone at the 4077th is hungry for news. When Charles gets a week's worth of newspapers, he hoards them all to himself, much to the unit’s dismay. When Charles finds one of his precious newspapers is missing he won’t rest until he finds the news-stealing culprit. South Korean soldiers come to the 4077th to claim a wounded Korean man as their prisoner. What the Korean Lieutenant doesn’t know is that his fellow soldier is the brother of the man he claims as their prisoner. Hawkeye discovers that these brothers were separated by command of their father, who had one son fight for each side in the hopes that one would survive to carry on the family name. Hawkeye is moved by their situation and helps to find a moment alone where the two men can be brothers again, if only for a moment.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep13
programme.desc: A Woman Too Far - Doogie is attracted to Lisa, a nursing student at the hospital, and asks her out on a date without telling Wanda. A patient who checks into the hospital has two wives, each unknown to the other.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Angels In Springtime - Actress Eve Le Deus is electrocuted in her hydro-massage tank. Eve's niece, Eve Perkins hires Bosley and the Angels to find the murderer and a missing manuscript in her aunt's possession at the time.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S2 Ep06

programme.desc: Communication Breakdown - Everyone at the 4077th is hungry for news. When Charles gets a week's worth of newspapers, he hoards them all to himself, much to the unit’s dismay. When Charles finds one of his precious newspapers is missing he won’t rest until he finds the news-stealing culprit. South Korean soldiers come to the 4077th to claim a wounded Korean man as their prisoner. What the Korean Lieutenant doesn’t know is that his fellow soldier is the brother of the man he claims as their prisoner. Hawkeye discovers that these brothers were separated by command of their father, who had one son fight for each side in the hopes that one would survive to carry on the family name. Hawkeye is moved by their situation and helps to find a moment alone where the two men can be brothers again, if only for a moment.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep13

programme.title: After School Club Ep554
programme.desc: After School Club is the Live Music Request show for K-Pop fans all around the world. On our weekly live show, you can join our video chat sessions through Google Hangouts, send us tweets, and share status. Also, ASC presents the K-POP stars' record storehouse! The ASC Archive will be a compilation of the deep conservations about the guests' albums, the diverse requests they carry out, as well as TMIs from behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: K-Biz, Scaling Up Tech Startups Ep37
programme.desc: Innovative startups for future growth. Targeting the global market with innovative technologies. Small, but competitive businesses in Korea. The revenues of small businesses have dropped due to the COVID-19 pandemic, and it is time to prepare proper measures to support small businesses.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep183
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Diplomat Talks Ep113
programme.desc: Diplomats residing in South Korea have prepared special stories to share and have extended their invitations to viewers around the world. Through in-depth conversations with ambassadors who are at the center of global discussions, viewers can learn about near, but far neighboring countries, as well as the rest of the multicultural nations co-existing on our planet. "Diplomat Talks" will be sharing stories from ambassadors, never been told before, with its viewers around the world.

programme.desc: Disgraced - Mr. Pugh plans a field trip for the Toledo chapter of the Ohio Naturalists; when Jack can't write his own book, he agrees to be ghostwrite for popular author Robin Shwank -- only to insert his own chapters into Shwank's book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Gary Meets Dave - Jack accidentally loses a significant amount of money and it falls in the hands of the students; as Principal Durbin and Helen investigate who stole the money, the students and teachers admit to other wrongdoings.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Get Hoppy - Principle Durbin turns into a power-hungry maniac after self-publishing Jack's philosophy book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mr. Pistachio - Jack has Mary drive him to the doctor, but a prank results in him getting the same procedure twice; at school, Durbin and Helen embarrass themselves and the kids compete over class superlative titles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep6
programme.desc: That That That - As the school prepares for winter break, Jack tries to record a lecture as a way into the University of Wisconsin's philosophy department; frustrated and unable to finish the video, he falls asleep and has nightmares.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Aces Wild - Helen has a vaping problem to overcome with the help of Durbin while Anthony's secret is revealed.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Katie Holmes Day - While the rest of the town prepares for the celebration of Toledo's annual Katie Holmes Day, Jack and Marissa plot to ruin the holiday pageant.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Tornado! - A tornado puts the school on lockdown and Helen believes it's coming specifically for her. The kids pass the time by writing fan fiction, "shipping" various combinations of faculty members.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweatpants - Jack has the students form a fake cult to sabotage Principal Durbin's new school uniforms. Mary, Stef and Michelle prepare to see one of their favorite artists who is in town to perform.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep3
programme.desc: An Oath To Rusty - Jack attempts to get closer with the guys at work by inviting them over for a game night. Helen helps Principal Durbin grow a backbone. Stef and Mary try to coax information out of Michelle about a court case.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Tons Of Rue - When the A.P. Bio students reunite Jack with his deadbeat dad, Jack plots revenge by trying to expose his allegedly reformed father. A witch foretells of a grim future for Mary, Stef and Michelle that divides the women.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep5
programme.desc: The Perfect Date From Hell - When Jack discovers his new girlfriend's therapy homework requires dating him, he turns the tables on her. Principal Durbin goes undercover to determine which faculty member is most worthy of a very special prize.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Love, For Lack Of A Better Term - Victor attempts to catch up to his peers and become a man by sending Ashlanda a risqué photo. Grace and Anthony try to "Parent Trap" Mary and Principal Durbin after overhearing a conversation on single adults.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Malachi - When Jack's girlfriend says she's going to dinner with a male friend, a jealous Jack tags along. Principal Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle take Helen out to cheer her up after a breakup.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Harvard Pen - Jack is enraged to find that the A.P. Bio students have stolen his beloved Harvard pen after he asked them not to touch it. Principal Durbin and Helen repeatedly fail the superintendent's inspections.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep5
programme.desc: Guardian - Agent Parker steps up to protect Director Vance after a terrifying home invasion. Also, the team detects advancements in Jessica and Jimmy’s blossoming romance.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep6
programme.desc: The Good Fighter - When an NCIS agent turns up dead and Kasie goes unaccounted for, the team must work quickly to find the killer.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

programme.title: Chucky Ep1
programme.desc: Death By Misadventure - When 14-year-old budding artist Jake Wheeler buys a vintage Good Guy doll at a yard sale, intending to use it in his latest sculpture, his young life will change forever for better and worse.

programme.title: Chucky Ep2
programme.desc: Give Me Something Good To Eat - On Halloween night, Chucky targets one of Jake's frenemies at a rocking costume party, forcing Jake to either stop the killer doll or help him.

programme.title: Chucky Ep3
programme.desc: I Like To Be Hugged - When Jake is finally pushed over the edge by bullies, Chucky reminisces about his first murder as a human boy, urging Jake to now make a choice kill or be killed.

programme.title: Chucky Ep4
programme.desc: Just Let Go - Someone's stalking the hospital where the survivors of Chucky's latest attack are recuperating. Meanwhile, Jake's bond with Devon intensifies as he teams up with an unlikely ally to outwit Chucky.

programme.title: Chucky Ep5
programme.desc: Little Little Lies - Jake and Devon are ready to take their relationship to the next level but after another gruesome murder at Chucky's far from idle hands, who has time for romance?

programme.title: Chucky Ep6
programme.desc: Cape Queer - As the body count in Hackensack continues to rise, Lexy and Junior's relationship becomes strained, while Jake and his friends set a risky trap for Chucky that could have dire consequences if it backfires.

programme.title: Chucky Ep7
programme.desc: Twice The Grieving, Double The Loss - As Hackensack reels from Chucky's relentless but secret reign of terror, the Mayor tries to allay fears by cluelessly arresting an innocent suspect.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep2
programme.desc: Teacher Jail - Despite his love of teacher jail where he's paid to not teach, Jack betrays the boisterous union rep who got him there in favor of Principal Durbin.

programme.title: First Dates S8 Ep22
programme.desc: There’s someone out there for everyone, and when the First Dates restaurant sets the table, hopeful singles from all walks of life will have a chance of meeting their dream partner. What happens next is up to them!

programme.title: First Dates S8 Ep23
programme.desc: There’s someone out there for everyone, and when the First Dates restaurant sets the table, hopeful singles from all walks of life will have a chance of meeting their dream partner. What happens next is up to them!

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep1
programme.desc: Premiere - Bakers must decode what type of dessert was made using just crumbs and a few elusive clues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep2
programme.desc: Meet The Competition - A second group of bakers is challenged to scour the kitchen to figure out what has been baked.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep3
programme.desc: Just Desserts - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short heads home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep4
programme.desc: Decisions, Decisions - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives will move forward in the competition and the duo that falls short will head home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep5
programme.desc: Rock And Roll - The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short heads home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep6
programme.desc: Red, White And Clue - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best dessert detectives continue on in the competition and the duo that falls short will head home, guest judge Aarón Sánchez.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep7
programme.desc: The Rise And Fall - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep8
programme.desc: Fight Until The Batter End - The bakers head back into the kitchen to take on a new delicious challenge. The best detectives continue on in the competition.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen Ep9
programme.desc: Finale - The top two dessert detective teams head back into the kitchen for their final challenges. One team is declared the best in the crime scene kitchen and walks away with the $100,000 prize.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: An idealistic young lawyer, taking on the case of an indigent family whose son is denied medical care by a powerful insurance company and dies, uncovers a multi-billion dollar insurance scam.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep7
programme.desc: Love Lost - NCIS must investigate the Secretary of the Navy when her husband claims she tried to murder him.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep8
programme.desc: NCIS is more than just an action drama. With liberal doses of humor, it's a show that focuses on the sometimes complex and always amusing dynamics of a team forced to work together in high-stress situations.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Hilarious comedy of a tough, hard-hitting Detroit street cop who takes matters into his own hands when a murder investigation takes him to the ultra-chic community of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Story centers on a traumatized woman fleeing from her abusive ex-husband with her 7-year-old son. In their new, remote sanctuary they find they have a bigger, more terrifying monster to deal with.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA Ep9
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Europe Ep10
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe’s evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it’s not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Outbreak! Ep8
programme.desc: The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the ocean’s most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South Africa Ep11
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Sub Sahara Ep12
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla and Delilah Ep9
programme.desc: The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep

programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

LUXE.TV unveils all the latest news on the most expensive watches and the rarest complications: automatic watches, mechanical watches, Swiss watches… Cartier, Rolex, Chopard, Piaget, Patek Philippe, Hublot, Audemars Piguet, Omega, Panerai, TAG Heuer, Vacheron Constantin, Zenith, Blancpain, Charriol, so many mythical houses, specialists of fine watchmaking, presenting their breathtaking innovations and creating the trends of the year 2022

programme.title: Luxe.This Year « Exotic And Incredible Escapes » (S52) Ep01
programme.desc: LUXE.TV takes you to the four corners of the globe to discover the most beautiful destinations. From beaches in Asia to fairytale palaces in Europe, from the biggest capital cities (Paris, New York, London) to the trendiest ski resorts (Courchevel, Megève) via the paradise islands of the Caribbean, everywhere offering a dreamlike escape.

programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep47
programme.desc: Why Skunk Smells - You see there was a time when Skunk didn't smell. Skunk smelt as sweet as sweet can be. Infact, whenever any animal had a smelly problem they went straight to Skunk. And then one day naughty Baboon tricks Skunk into tasting the yucky Smellyfruit! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep48
programme.desc: Why Cricket Crickets / Chirrups - You see there was a time when Cricket didn't chirrup. Infact Cricket didn't do anything at all and it was beginning to get him down. Every animal has a use. Elephant trumpets, Lion roars...but what does Cricket do? And then one day Cricket discovers that he has rhythm. Cricket finds the beat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep47
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Special Things - When Fuse's collection of Special Things goes missing, Noddy vows to track them down. He soon works out that Bling was in Fuse's Workshop but it turns out that she just went in to add a Special Thing to Fuse's collection. More clues lead Noddy to Smartysaurus. She admits she went into Fuse's Workshop but tripped on an oil can and fled when she saw all the mess she'd made. As for the Special Things, they'd already gone when she got there. Noddy begins to despair but then he works out that the oil can must have been left by whoever took the Special Things. Remembering that Pat-Pat's scooter was squeaky, Noddy goes to the Treehouse and finds the Pockets with Fuse's Special Things. They'd 'found' Fuse's Special Things and taken them to start a collection of their own. They apologies for taking the special things and, as a reward for owning up, Fuse gives them a tool from his workshop to start their own collection. Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Grey Coins - The Captain is upset because all of his shiny gold coins have been painted grey. It's a disaster as far as the pirates are concerned! Noddy decides to investigate. He realises that the grey coins are actually the gold coin covered with paint. They're not the only things that have turned grey too – Deltoid's shiny gold medal has been painted grey too. After following all the clues, Noddy works out that the Naughticorns are the culprits! They were jealous of anything being shinier or more golden than their shiny gold horns! The Naughticorns apologise to the other toys and soon everyone has their shiny gold coins and medals back to normal again. Phew! Thank you, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep47
programme.desc: How Can I Make The Trolley Go Faster? - Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep48
programme.desc: How Can We Mend Baa’S Trough? - There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. It's the perfect shape to mend the hole – and because it's clay the water won't leak out again! They've answered the question. And here comes the rain again so the

programme.desc: Recipe For Disaster - The gang breaks into Stricklers office for clues to Killahead Bridge but ends up releasing a monster into school and Strickler reveals his true form.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep11
programme.desc: Have Dragon Will Travel Pt 2 - Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns To The Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep17
programme.desc: Cleopatra Needs Space - Akila and Brian are having major romance drama and Cleo HAS to get away from it. She gets captured by Space Scavengers, but it’s still kind of an improvement.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower For Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends… until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep18
programme.desc: Two'S Company - Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show / Pups Save an Eagle - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day? // While out in the woods, the pups rescue an eagle caught in twine and tied to her own nest!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312

programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Good Mayor - Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington And The Aliens - Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep215

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep216

Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.desc: The Magic Trick - Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Axle City Grand Prix - Gabby has the perfect tool to get Blaze ready to race: a special remote that can control any machine. But when Crusher takes her remote, he activates machines all over town to slow Blaze down.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles / Santiago's Regatta - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep157
programme.desc: The Magic Trick - Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: Trailer - When it's time for the Tubby Custard Ride, there's a special trailer the Teletubbies haven't seen before. It's for The Noo-Noo who gets to go on a special Tubby Custard Ride.

programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.desc: Fool on Fleck / Ramping Up - A mysterious Prankster mails Mayor Fleck a threat to prank him in public, Duke becomes the reluctant mayor's bodyguard. // Fire Marshal Finn McCormack increases safety measures to the new stunt show.

programme.desc: First Delivery / Chore or Less - While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.desc: Dr. Sleep - In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep. But does it work?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: The Road Warrior - Alvin sounds the alarm when he believes Theodore has joined a motorcycle gang of vampires!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: My Fair Chipette - When Brittany declines Alvin's help for a talent show, he convinces Jeanette to enter, putting them at odds.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Gone Gal - When Miss Croner has a disagreement with Miss Miller, she fakes her disappearance to get even.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: Bottle Burglars - When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Vidja Games - Danger Force and Captain Man get hooked making celebrity "Holla" videos to start raking in cash. But when making celebrity videos turns into a popularity contest, they accidentally send out a "Holla" video that reveals their secret identities.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Secret Legacy Pt. 2 - Robby has trouble adjusting after his family's big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Ghost in the Machine - When the crew gets trapped in the holodeck by a mysterious malfunction, they aren't sure what's programmed or what's real.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep123
programme.desc: One of the Boys / A Tattler’s Tale - Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality. // Lola wants to be a part of the siblings' secrets club, but they won't let her in because she's a 'tattle tale'.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Catastrophe - When Nate is paired with Jenny on a school project, he hopes to prove his awesomeness to her, but his cat phobia threatens to destroy his cool. Meanwhile, Ellen sets out to cure Martin of a deeply ingrained phobia of his own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep134
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Last Stand - SpongeBob and Patrick protest the construction of a highway that would destroy Jellyfish Fields.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep108

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep6
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.

programme.title: Liga Super 2022 SWU lwn SEL

programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep28
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
